note.p: Italian diplomat. Appointed Italian extraordinary envoy to Portugal, January 1864; Mexico, December 1864; Japan and China, 1867; Sweden, 1871; Rio de Janeiro, 1879.

María Pilar Araguás Biescas, ‘Objetos orientales en la colección romana del conde Vittorio Sallier de La Tour (1888)’, www.adecjapan.es/congreso-aeje/programa/comunicaciones/49-pilar-araguas.html (accessed 9 July 2014)
